arts.ttl: Huge Portsmouth boost as John Mousinho's side buck Championship relegation trend with Preston win
arts.sum: Pompey picked up just their second win of the season on Saturday.

arts.ttl: 'Totally bullied' - Preston manager's furious rant after defeat as 'direct' Portsmouth approach addressed
arts.sum: Portsmouth were deserved winners at Fratton Park on Saturday.

arts.ttl: DETAILED: Portsmouth boss reveals events behind dramatic Colby Bishop heart surgery return after sensational Preston North End comeback
arts.sum: John Mousinho has lifted the lid on the sequence of events which led to Colby Bishop’s incredible Pompey goalscoring return from open-heart surgery.

arts.ttl: 'So special': Colby Bishop's emotional message to the wonderful Portsmouth faithful after fairy-tale comeback
arts.sum: An emotional Colby Bishop thanked the Fratton faithful for their touching reception as he made an early-awaited Pompey return.

arts.ttl: 'A fairytale return, best game for Blues, blossoming into some player': Neil Allen's Portsmouth player ratings from 3-1 win over Preston
arts.sum: Fratton Park witnessed its first Pompey win of the season as they climbed off the foot of the Championship.

arts.ttl: 'We are saved. Written in the stars. Colby Bishop lucky charm' - How Portsmouth faithful have reacted to victory against Preston North End and return of goal hero
arts.sum: Pompey fans on social media have plenty of reasons to rejoice this evening.

arts.ttl: Colby Bishop completes fairytale Portsmouth return to seal huge Preston North End win
arts.sum: Colby Bishop capped an incredible Pompey return to seal his side’s maiden Fratton Championship victory as they moved from the foot of the table.

arts.ttl: Colby Bishop makes goalscoring return as Portsmouth move off bottom
arts.sum: The striker, playing for the first time since close-season heart surgery, scored a late penalty in a 3-1 win over Preston.

arts.ttl: Colby Bishop's Portsmouth inclusion v Preston North End - and when permission was granted by EFL
arts.sum: Pompey’s ability to include Colby Bishop in their squad for Saturday’s Championship game against Preston North End has been explained.

arts.ttl: Portsmouth faithful all ask same thing as Colby Bishop makes shock return to squad following heart surgery for game against Preston North End
arts.sum: Pompey fans on social media have been asking the same thing following John Mousinho’s latest team selection.
